Posts.Content: christine1000 wrote: Hi - I am having a port put in my arm (along the inside) on Friday for CTH infusions beginning in about 10 days - my veins are shot from chemo 9 years ago (this is my 2nd dx) - does anyone else have a port in their arm; what was the reason - I know a lot of people get them in their chests, but you can also get them in your arm, and I don't understand the difference.  Thanks-  Christine Dx 5/2009, 2cm, Stage IIA, Grade 1, 0/0 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Port for infusions- in arm christine1000 Kodapants
